We’re proud of your accomplishment and can’t wait to hear about all the great things you’ll do. UIC hosts commencement ceremonies in the fall and spring for graduating students. Summer graduates are encouraged to participate in the fall ceremonies.             Apply to graduate       Commencement day       RSVP       Commencement FAQs       Faculty information                  Fall graduation   Everything you need to know about fall commencement            Spring graduation   Everything you need to know about spring commencement                     Welcome to Alumniville: The UIC AHS Alumni Community    Welcome to Alumniville is an annual end-of-year party for recent and soon-to-be AHS graduates where we celebrate their accomplishments and recognize them as the newest members to the UIC AHS alumni community.     View the 2019 Alumniville photos        Couldn't attend?   Have family and friends that couldn’t make it? No problem! They can watch a video of past AHS Commencement ceremonies and view photos online .            We're here to help   Have questions about commencement? Contact Eileen Doran for more information.    You can contact Eileen at:     Email  eileend2@uic.edu      Phone  312-996-2078      Address  1919 W.
